subject_labels: Must use CDK v2.x with TypeScript
VPC CIDR block must be exactly 10.0.0.0/16
Deploy in exactly 2 availability zones only
Use only one NAT Gateway to minimize costs
All resources must have the specified tags
VPC Flow Logs must use 5-minute capture intervals
Route tables must be explicitly created, not use defaults
VPC endpoints must be Gateway endpoints, not Interface endpoints
All CloudFormation outputs must use CfnOutput construct
Subnet CIDR blocks must follow the exact numbering scheme specified
